# gsolaceclustermgr Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "gsolaceclustermgr" {
  bearer_token = "<someBearerToken>"
  host         = "https://api.solace.cloud"
}
```

### Required

- `bearer_token` (String, Sensitive)
- `host` (String)
